# `wrap_msg`

Wrap message


## Description

Wrap message


## Usage

```r
wrap_msg(..., sep = " ")
```


## Arguments

Argument      |Description
------------- |----------------
`...`     |     additional strings and/or elements to pass to wrap_txt
`sep`     |     how to join elements of string (default is one space)
